1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour,1 teaspoon baking powder,1 teaspoon baking soda,1 teaspoon kosher salt,2 ounces dark chocolate, broken into pieces,1 cup white sugar,1/2 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature,1 large egg,2 bananas, mashed (about 1 cup),1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract,1/2 cup chopped walnuts,1/2 cup semisweet chocolate chips,12 slices banana (optional),2 tablespoons white sugar,,
